attributes.action: Bring back the Death penalty in the uk
attributes.additional_details:
The death penalty needs to be brought back into action in the uk! Why put people in prison,wasting our money,the governments money for these people to be housed,fed
And helped! The people that have raped,murdered,done any crime that a person of normal mind could not comprehend committing,should not be allowed to live,simply placing them in a prison so they still have some sort of life is disgraceful,when the victims and victims families will live with it forever! It's disgusting that these people could or will one day be released and will most probably re-offend.this is what's wrong with the system,it is backwards! I cannot understand why it was ever abolished in the first place!
Bring back the death penalty
